contains input parameters for wavefront tomography. More...

Detailed Description

contains input parameters for wavefront tomography.

Field Documentation

int TOMO_CFG_T::square

use square/rectangular grid instead of tighter irregular grid

int TOMO_CFG_T::cone

use cone coordinate in xloc: keep true

int TOMO_CFG_T::invpsd

use inverse of PSD in tomography instead of biharmonic approx

int TOMO_CFG_T::guard

guard rings of reconstruction grid xloc

int TOMO_CFG_T::pos

over sampling factor of ploc over actuator spacing

double TOMO_CFG_T::tik_cstr

tikhonov regularization.

int TOMO_CFG_T::xloc_tight

reduce uncoupled points in xloc.

Keep False

int TOMO_CFG_T::piston_cr

single point piston constraint.

int TOMO_CFG_T::split

split tomography type.

  • 0: integrated tomography
  • 1: adhoc split tomography
  • 2: minimum variance split tomography

int TOMO_CFG_T::split_wt

0: use Wg, 1: using Wa

int TOMO_CFG_T::split_Rngs_svd

use svd method to calculate NGS mode in split tomography mode.

Todo:
implement this

int TOMO_CFG_T::split_idealngs

ideal correction on NGS modes.

For skycoverage preprocessing.

int TOMO_CFG_T::split_rtt

remote tip/tilt in high order DM fit output in split mode

int TOMO_CFG_T::alg

Tomography algorithm to solve the linear equation.

Todo:
implement BGS, MG 0: Cholesky direct solve for the large matrix. (CBS) 1: CG or PCG.

int TOMO_CFG_T::precond

Tomography preconditioner.

0: No preconditioner. (CG) 1: Fourier Domain Preconditioner. (FDPCG)

double TOMO_CFG_T::minwt

minimum layer weight allowed.

if less than this will force to this.

int TOMO_CFG_T::maxit

max iterations.

Usually 30 for CG, 3 for FDPCG in closed loop warm restart. x10 in open loop

int TOMO_CFG_T::assemble

force assemble tomography matrix in CG

int TOMO_CFG_T::windest

estimate wind.

Todo:
finish implement it.

int TOMO_CFG_T::windshift

shift opdr using wind velocity (from input if windest=0)
